title: Multi-modal hypergraph contrastive learning for medical image segmentation
details: W Jing, J Wang, D Di, D Li, Y Song, L Fan - Pattern Recognition, 2025
abstract: Self-supervised learning (SSL) has become a dominant approach in multi-modal medical image segmentation. However, existing methods, such as Seq SSL and Joint SSL, suffer from catastrophic forgetting and conflicts in representation learning …

title: Automatic Brain Tumor Segmentation: Advancing U-Net With ResNet50 Encoder for Precise Medical Image Analysis
details: S Saifullah, A Yudhana, AP Suryotomo - IEEE Access, 2025
abstract: Automated brain tumor segmentation from MRI images is critical for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning. This study presents a novel ResUNet50-based approach, integrating ResNet50 as an encoder within the U-Net framework to …
